message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find valuable. I'm willing to part with it for $95.
Thank you for offering the product, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to share it. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a good deal.  I could come down to $90, which I think is a fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, I would like to propose a price of $82 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your negotiating, but $82 is too low for me. I can do $87 as my final offer.  Take it or leave it.
